name: lngndx

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(clng, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat7))
-| wceq(clng, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat7)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat7), cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ (LineG ` ndx)= cdc(1, 7)
⊣ LineG = Slot(cdc(1, 7))
⊣ cdc(1, 7)∈ ℕ
